# Spaced Formatting Rules

## Rules

### Basic Symbols

| Symbol(s) | Description                  | Rule                                      |
| --------- | ---------------------------- | ----------------------------------------- |
| `(`       | Open parentheses             | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `)`       | Closing parentheses          | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `{`       | Open braces                  | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `}`       | Closing braces               | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `[`       | Open brackets                | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `]`       | Closing brackets             | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `+`       | Addition                     | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `-`       | Subtraction                  | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `*`       | Multiplication               | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `/`       | Division                     | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `%`       | Modulo                       | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `<`       | Less than                    | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `>`       | Greater than                 | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `<=`      | less than or equal           | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `>=`      | greater than or equal        | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `=`       | Assignment operator          | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `==`      | Loose equality               | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `===`     | Strict equality              | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `!=`      | Not equal                    | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `!==`     | Strict not equal             | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `&&`      | Logical `AND`                | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `\|\|`    | Logical `OR`                 | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `??`      | Nullish coalescing operator  | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `\|`      | Bitwise `OR`                 | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `!`       | Logical `NOT`                | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `?`       | Ternary conditional operator | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `=>`      | Arrow Functions              | One or more empty spaces before and after |
| `,`       | Comma                        | One or more empty spaces after            |

### Regex Matches

| Regex           | Description                                         | Rule                           |
| --------------- | --------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------ |
| `[A-Za-z0-9_]:` | Any letter, number, or underscore, then colon-space | One or more empty spaces after |
| `,[\r\n]+`      | Comma followed by one or more newlines              | Ignore (Fine as is)            |

### Auxiliary Symbols

| Symbol(s) | Description                                | Rule   |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------ | ------ |
| `++`      | Unary plus                                 | Ignore |
| `--`      | Unary negation                             | Ignore |
| `);`      | Closing parentheses followed by semicolon  | Ignore |
| `};`      | Closing braces followed by semicolon       | Ignore |
| `];`      | Closing brackets followed by semicolon     | Ignore |
| `!.`      | Logical `NOT` followed by dot operator     | Ignore |
| `?.`      | Optional chaining operator                 | Ignore |
| `).`      | Closing parentheses followed dot operator  | Ignore |

### Extra Abstract Rules

- `_` underscore value used for internal `local variables`
- Allman formatting on all `classes`, `functions`, and `conditionals` (`if`, `for`, `do`, `while`, and `do while`)
